SimpleCursorListItemProviderInternal * mpInternal

Detailed Description

An easy adapter to map columns from a cursor to TextWidgets or ImageWidgets defined in an XML file.

You can specify which columns you want, which widgets you want to display the columns, and the XML file that defines the appearance of these widgets.

Binding occurs in two phases. First, if a gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::WidgetBinder is available, WidgetBinder::setWidgetValue(gaia::core::Widget*, gaia::storage::Cursor*, int32_t) is invoked. If the returned value is true, binding has occured. If the returned value is false and the widget to bind is a TextWidget, setWidgetText(TextWidget*, const gaia::base::String&) is invoked. If the returned value is false and the widget to bind is an ImageWidget, setWidgetImage(ImageWidget* const gaia::base::String&) is invoked. If no appropriate binding can be found, a warning message will be logged.

If this ListItemProvider is used with filtering, for instance in a gaia::ui::AutoCompleteEditWidget, you can use the gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::CursorToStringConverter and the gaia::ui::FilterQueryProvider interfaces to get control over the filtering process. You can refer to convertToString(gaia::storage::Cursor*) for more information.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::SimpleCursorListItemProvider ( gaia::core::Context *  context,
int32_t  layoutId,
gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor,
const gaia::base::Array< gaia::base::String > &  from,
const gaia::base::Array< int32_t > &  to,
bool  autoRequery = false 
) [explicit]

Standard constructor.

Parameters:
contextThe context where the ListWidget associated with this SimpleCursorListItemProvider is running
layoutIdResource identifier of a layout file that defines the widgets for this list item. The layout file should include at least those named widgets defined in "to"
cursorThe database cursor. Can be NULL if the cursor is not available yet.
fromA list of column names representing the data to bind to the UI. Can be empty if the cursor is not available yet.
toThe widgets that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextWidgets. The first N widgets in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter. Can be empty if the cursor is not available yet.
autoRequeryIf true the adapter will call requery() on the cursor whenever it changes so the most recent data is always displayed. Using true here is discouraged.
virtual gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::~SimpleCursorListItemProvider ( ) [virtual]

The destructor of SimpleCursorListItemProvider.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::bindWidget ( gaia::core::Widget *  widget,
gaia::core::Context *  context,
gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor 
) [virtual]

Binds all of the field names passed into the "to" parameter of the constructor with their corresponding cursor columns as specified in the "from" parameter.

Binding occurs in two phases. First, if a gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::WidgetBinder is available, WidgetBinder::setWidgetValue(gaia::core::Widget*, gaia::storage::Cursor*, int32_t) is invoked. If the returned value is true, binding has occured. If the returned value is false and the widget to bind is a TextWidget, setWidgetText(TextWidget*, const gaia::base::String&) is invoked. If the returned value is false and the widget to bind is an ImageWidget, setWidgetImage(ImageWidget* const gaia::base::String&) is invoked. If no appropriate binding can be found, a warning message will be logged.

See also:
bindWidget(gaia::core::Widget*, gaia::core::Context*, gaia::storage::Cursor*)
getWidgetBinder()
setWidgetBinder(WidgetBinder*)
setWidgetImage(ImageWidget*, const gaia::base::String&)
setWidgetText(TextWidget*, const gaia::base::String&)

Implements gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider.

virtual gaia::base::String gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::convertToString ( gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor) [virtual]

Returns a String representation of the specified Cursor as defined by the current CursorToStringConverter.

If no CursorToStringConverter has been set, the String conversion column is used instead. If the conversion column is -1, the returned String is empty if the cursor is NULL or the default String representation of the cursor.

Parameters:
cursorthe Cursor to convert to a String
Returns:
a String representing the cursor

Reimplemented from gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider.

void gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::setStringConversionColumn ( int32_t  stringConversionColumn)

Defines the index of the column in the Cursor used to get a String representation of that Cursor.

The column is used to convert the Cursor to a String only when the current CursorToStringConverter is NULL.

Parameters:
stringConversionColumna valid index in the current Cursor or -1 to use the default conversion mechanism

virtual void gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::setWidgetImage ( ImageWidget *  w,
const gaia::base::String &  value 
) [virtual]

Called by bindWidget() to set the image for an ImageWidget but only if there is no existing WidgetBinder or if the existing WidgetBinder cannot handle binding to an ImageWidget.

By default, the value will be treated as an image resource.

Intended to be overridden by ListItemProviders that need to filter strings retrieved from the database.

Parameters:
wImageWidget to receive an image
valuethe value retrieved from the cursor
virtual void gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider::setWidgetText ( TextWidget *  w,
const gaia::base::String &  text 
) [virtual]

Called by bindWidget() to set the text for a TextWidget but only if there is no existing WidgetBinder or if the existing WidgetBinder cannot handle binding to a TextWidget.

Intended to be overridden by ListItemProviders that need to filter strings retrieved from the database.

Parameters:
wTextWidget to receive text
textthe text to be set for the TextWidget
